definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dedicate, consecrate, (cf. We:Skizzen iii. 118), separate, in relig. and ceremonial sense (NH only as denom., cf. II. [[נזר]]; Ar. nad-ara make a vow, cf. We:Skizzen iii. 117 f., RS:i. 463 f., 2d ed. 482 f.; Sab. [[נדַר]] vow Levy:ZMG xxii (l868), 196 Min. id., Hom:Südar. Chrest. 128; Aram. ndar [[נְדַד]], vow; As. nazâru, curse Dl:HWB 457);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִנׇּזֵר]] Ez Eze 14:7, [[וַיִנׇּזֵר]] Le 22:2; [[וַיִּנׇּֽזְרוּ]] Ho 9:10; Inf. abs. [[הִנׇּזֵר]] Zec 7:3; —devote, dedicate oneself  unto ([[ל]]), [[הַבּשֶׁת]], i.e. Baïal Ho 9:10; from ([[מִן]]) ´[[י]] Ez Eze 14:7 (of apostasy); hold sacredly aloof from, ([[מִן]]) Le 22:2 (H); abs. Zec 7:3 consecrating my(self ), i.e. by fasting.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[מִטֻּמְאָתָם]] ´[[וְהִזֵּרְתֶּם אֶת־בְּנֵי־יִשׂ]] Lv Le 15:31 (P) and ye shall keep the sons of Isr. sacredly separate from their uncleanness (but rd. perh. [[וְהִזְהַרְתָּם]] warn away from—as Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 33:8, Eze 33:9, —so Sam LXX—as to sense—Di Kau).—Vid. also II. [[[נׇוַר]]].
